definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Versatility. Just like Phelps in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 一如菲爾普斯在泳池上那麼多才多藝。

sentences.english: They are also multitalented, and can become accomplished in many different ways.
sentences.chinese: 他們也很多才多藝，可以在許多不同的領域獲得成功。

sentences.english: You need to be versatile to get the most out of Florida's fly fishing adventures.
sentences.chinese: 您須爲獲得最多才多藝佛羅里達的冒險飛行捕魚。

sentences.english: There are few truly multi-talented pop-stars. Ronan is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 很少有多才多藝的流行歌手，而羅南就是其中的一個。

sentences.english: Aileen stands out for her incredible versatility as an actress.
sentences.chinese: 艾琳多才多藝，是一位出類拔萃的女演員。

sentences.english: Wang has established himself as a versatile musician in the Mando-pop scene.
sentences.chinese: 在華語歌壇，王力宏一直被認同是多才多藝的。

sentences.english: Classically trained and multi-talented, Wang Leehom is one of the Asia's leading songwriters.
sentences.chinese: 正規培訓的多才多藝的王力宏是亞洲頂尖作曲者之一。
多才多藝是這個時代的口號。

sentences.english: This is a very potted history of a very interesting, talented person.
sentences.chinese: 這是關於一個有趣的，多才多藝的人的既定的歷史。

sentences.english: He is a nimble and versatile wit.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個機敏而又多才多藝的才子。

sentences.english: One of the most versatile items in the Clippard line.
sentences.chinese: 一個在Clippard行最多才多藝的項目。

sentences.english: South Korean fresh face Ha Ji-won is a very talented actress.
sentences.chinese: 韓國新人河智苑是一個多才多藝的女演員。

sentences.english: Sondheim again was able to show his versatility and his adaptability.
sentences.chinese: 桑德海姆又一次的展現出他的多才多藝和改編能力。

sentences.english: He is a very versatile writer.
sentences.chinese: 他是個多才多藝的作家。

sentences.english: John is a good student in an all-round way.
sentences.chinese: 約翰是個多才多藝的學生。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
